Peaceful land

Here is a peaceful land.
I don't have much to say here coz no one will share this with me, I hope my word can be heard, but maybe I expext too much here, okay, my friends, can I call you guys friends, these are the last words I have here, bye for ever.

New life

After suffering in silence for such a long time, now it's the good time to end all of this up.

That experience gave me a good lesson, and I admit that I am more matured after going through it.
We human beings should try our best to enjoy the happiness of life, right? Forget about those rainy days, just let it go. Coz I believe that there's someone who's waiting for me on the way to my future, he will be someone I can count on and trust, he won't fail me in every way, he will treat me like a princess and love me with all his heart, he won't hurt me if he know it in advance, he will be free that everytime I need him..

Goodbye, old days.
Welcome to my new life!!!

My little boy

We are playing well here.

Just sometimes, I want to travel to somewhere for few days to relax myself, but it's kind of impossible after having my little hope.
My dog is more handsome and totally different from the very beginning now, I like every way he acts except the time he bites me badly, But he means no harm, he just want to get more attention from me, and wants me to play with him.
I really feel sorry for him that leaving him alone at home for the whole day, and I still can not spend too much time on accompanying him as I have a lot of things to do, like cleaning up, cooking, feeding we both... ...
Sometimes, I hope he was my little boy, and one day he can take good care of himself very well, like how much he should eat per meal, not pull my everything all around, maybe read some books to kick boring away.
Nowadays, he likes to sit on my knees and eat from my hand, he's so lovely and cute boy.
I like him, and I do want to look after him very well..

Escape

Boy, I want to escape from this world.

Lost

I lost my little hope.
I don't want to say that, but I may lose it forever.
OMG.
Help me~

Am I a....

I like beautiful girls. I like watching those beauties.
They are the beautiful monsters in this world, and i can not let them escape from my eyes. Same as beautiful sights.
I love to find and catch the tiny and beautiful part of life, which can make me feel brave and relax. I'm not going to envy the luxury life, coz there's no luxury thing in my blood. I'm not going to grab or seize anything, coz no one can own anything in real, we are all passengers on this earth, we born with nothing, and die with nothing. And all I can do and want to do is to see more sights on my trip, to make my short trip as interesting as possible. I'd love to learn and see things, if there's anyone who want to show me, that' ll be better.
But anyways, I'm happy that I'm a girl.... ...

Responsibility

As an adult, we should take on some responsibility even though some are what we don't want to face. But, we have to.
I received a call from my mom last night, we talked about savings and my brother's marriage, and I fell bad.
I know it's the time to pay them back as I should do, but I still wonder that if I can live a free and relax life for myself, just like others do. I didn't have much savings, but at least I can live very well on myself, and I don't need my parents to give me a helping hand any more.
I don't need to count on someone else and closed to work forever like other girls did, I mean I can live well on my own, and I live safe and happy with my earnings. Money is nothing but a tool and the basement of life, and more money doesn't mean you will live a happier life.
I am not saying money is useless, but it's not as important as life itself. Mom, I just need a free and easy atmosphere which can help me get close to my future. Coz I can not enjoy my life and each everything under those pressures...
And I'm still not sure where I am standing in this world... I am confused.

PS: My dear brother, I know it's hard, but if I were you, I won't get married if my finance situation doesn't allow me to do that.

Kissing In The Wind

Tonight.
When the heat left,
The wind starts to blow,
gently and slightly.
As the noises were locked up,
Dusts were taking rest in the corner,
peacefully and quietly.

High above our heads,
It's the mysterious blue velvet sky,
beautiful and lovable.
The moon feels shy and hides up,
Stars start to play hide-and-seek there,
smart and naughty.

We are shoulder to shoulder.
We are hand in hand.
We walk in the same rhythm.
We make eye contact from time to time.

Can you feel the warmth of mine,
When you hold my hands firmly and even my body?
Can you feel the thrill of my heart,
When you lift up my hands and settle it on your chest?
Can you feel the emotions shaping in my eyes,
When I look up at you and both of us ain't saying anything?

___
Kiss me in the wind... ...

As Long As You Are Safe

Hi.
I heard some bad news from your side
And it comes as a small stone which
Creases the peaceful and resting lake in my heart
Leaves me a restless mind

You should know that
I care about you
As much as I did before
No matter what we are
And where we are standing
This care is still there

You tell me that you are so sad to know that
I had a new BF
But
If you are so sensitive
How can’t you feel
How sad and depressed I was,
When you stopped messaging me?
Why can’t you feel
How desperate and helpless I was,
When you stopped calling me?

You tell me you are sad.
But why?
Aren’t you feeling happy for me that
I find someone who
Loves me more than you
Cares me more than you did
Likes to share every tiny thing with me
Willing to face everything with me

I don’t regret falling in love with you before
And, I won’t regret to leave you either

Why not go and find someone else who’s better than me?
As long as you are safe
I’m happy for you.

Do take care. ---------------Agape 2011.08.22

If I die young

I have seen that MV, and honestly, I don't like it.
But her voice is good anyways.

Well, I always imagine how it will go on once my life stopped suddenly, like drving on the highway, or on the train of a tour, or in a fligh of a business trip... ...
Maybe nothing will happen, just few people will think of me from time to time, that's all.
I read a book last weekend, an article tells" we all come with no name." It surely is. We all have no name after born, and we are putting everything on ourselves to distinguish our own from the rest, what's that for? One day, we died in an accident, everything will sealed with our death.
That's the real fact, not beautiful or memorable at all.

Global Warming

Mountains collapse, sea level started to rise.

I don't want to say this, but I gain much weight indeed.
And the reason is nothing but work and life.

Busy, and not happy as well. Should I act like an adult, like focus on earning money and try every way to achieve that? I do want to change my current job, then I started to notice that I've already held up by it, Miserable me.
Close, but not satisfied. They say family is most important, and we should be happy as they come to visit us, but why can't I feel the same way? Everything messed up, it seems like my heart and ears are too full to accept anything. Less patient, bad-tempered... what's wrong with me? I just want to flee away and get rid of those things.
Don't wanna talk, don't wanna hear, don't wanna see, why can't I live alone and without bothered by anyone?

Finally, food left. The most comfortable and best friend of mine, it tastes sweet, and it makes me feel like wrapped by happiness when I eat something sweet.
Then, in it's considerable care, I fell asleep... ...

The way I am used to

I should feel guilty and blame myself for this, what if I paid more attention, what if you were vaccinated earlier, what if I followed the doctor's advice and paid all the medicine he prescribed... What if I did all things I failed to do, you might be cured and waiting me at home now...

I am used to waking up and seeing your joyful face
as you are always fresh and delighted

I am used to taking you outside and showing you to everyone
as you are famous and my shiny star

I am used to your trying to climb up my knees and licking my face
as you are so cute and lovely

I am used to hearing your begging noises while eating my snacks and feeding you with another hand
as you are pretty childish and naive

I am used to your paws attaching to my leg and asking me to carry you in my arms
as you are still timid and young

I am used to calling your name and talking to you while I feel lonely
as you are very considerate and understanding

I am used to giving you a bath, drying you up and touching your head
as you are too small and more like my baby

I am used to buying breakfast with you and going to market with you
as you are a little curious toward this world and ready to go

I am used to thinking about you while at outside and keeping in mind what you like
as you are my little boy, my love and my everything.

I am used to the new and happy life you bring to me, and I cannot stop it.
You left a hole in my heart, and it's bleeding all the time, as everything will remind me of you.
You know what, I bought a new book to replace the broken book you bitten and borrowed from library, I will cherish it for my whole life as it was a gift from you.

But my little boy, I'm so sorry that:
I cannot warm up your cold and stiff body,
I cannot wake you up, kiss your forehead and tell you that I love you.
I cannot stop your life passing away
I cannot do that,
my little boy.
How much I wanted it back, but I'm so helpless... ...

My boy, will you still love me, if you know that I am the murderer???

Ready to LOVE?

You said "I love you",
But I got a little confused.

What is love?
--Love should not be sex.
Love is love, it's just a strong feeling, nothing more than that. You can attch the happiness of sex to love, but love can never be replaced by it.

--Love should is not despotism or surrender.
Someone spoils the one he loves, even if his lover wanted drugs, he will go and get it;
Someone confines the one he loves, "bab, this is not good for you, that's not good either... okay, take this..."
We can not give up or take someone's freedom away, we both need to compromise a little bit, make sure he/she is alive and happy, that's all.
No one want to take further steps with you if you insisted the way you like instead of what your love like, coz none of us will love a person who always stops us from doing everything.

--Love should come with responsibility.
Love me, and be mine. You can never say it easily. But it's not equal to marriage either.

Love?
I'm not ready for it now.

You love me?
Convince me first.

Like or Love?

Will you come?
Do you feel happy to see me?
Will you like me?
Do you love me?
Will you be my bride?
Do you want to be my boyfriend?
Will you do that for me?
Do you miss me always?
Will you treat me like your baby?
Do you take me as part of yourself?
Will you marry me?
Do you have plans for our mutual future?
Will you take the challenge to be with me for the rest of life?
Do you think you are ready for that?
... ...

Will you?
Do you?

How are you...

So, boy,
how are you?

You want to make sure I'm good?
Or you just have nothing to say?

I don't know how to answer your repeated question,
but i think i'm still good,
as i'm not dying,
i'm not chased by monsters.

The gap between us gets bigger and bigger,
and I get more sensitive while in love,
I know it's not good,
but I just can not stop.

i'm thinking that i may not be good at loving someone,
i'd better get back to single.

Some thoughts baffle me recently.
But i will find out someday.

Don't worry.
I'm good.

Sweetie, don't be panic

I told you not talking about the last night,
then you started to ask what happened and what you missed
boy, you are just too sensitive
but I like it,
coz you care for me so much.

I told you i felt bad when you didn't pick up my call
when I was calling you
then you started to be cautious
and called me straight away while seeing a missed call
even though it's not from me
boy, you are so sincere,
and I really appreciate.

You sent me a message
which asked me why I didn't send you meassges
for more than seven days
boy, you noticed my existence finally
and I felt happy with it.

Please be happy with me.
Wish all of you the best...

My knight

I felt bad.

The last night was
scary and dark.

There was
no one here
beside me.

I was not lonely.

Maybe
I just need
my little hope
who can accompany me
in the long
and cold night.

Help me warm up my body
and my fragile heart
Stay awake at my bedside
like a knight.

Agape.

Love letters

I have been expecting one kind of life, the couples will leave messages or write letters to each other even though they meet and sleep together everyday.
Well, that would be so lovely.
Recently, I read a book, it tells about the love letters of those great men in the history, like Napoleon, Balzac, Tolstoy, and etc.
I must say that nature is so frail when a human falls in love with another person (no matter it's a man or a woman), the emotions start to burst out from our chest and sometimes it is so easy to be turned into anger or hate.
Anyone who indulged in love will become a good author or a talented poet. Sometimes, the feelings exceed words, and all we can do is to stare at the one we love and feel the marvelous love running around inside our body.
"Can you feel the love inside my heart?" Lovers always ask this stupid question, but unfortunately---No, they can't, coz it's your own treasure, it's your own fortune that no one can take it away.

I love to write, or to read. I love the feelings the author gives me, I love the languages human created, and that's how my life becomes more beautiful and lovable.
"My adorable husband, I would like to compose love letters for you.
Will you be happy to read them?"

Will you....

Will you come over to comfort me if I was crying at roadside in a cold and dark night?
